app-banner-des: Seamless payments anytime, anywhere. Effortlessly pay with our app.
our-features-title: <innerText>Unlock the Power</innerText> of <newLine /> Seamless Global Payments
our-features-nfc-des: Our payment solution app ensures the highest level of security for your cross-border transactions. With advanced encryption technology and stringent security protocols, your financial information is protected at all times. Rest easy knowing that your money is in safe hands.
our-features-fast-transfer-des: Our payment solution app ensures the highest level of security for your cross-border transactions. how-it-works-title: <innerText className='gradient'>Unlock the Power</innerText> of <newLine/> Seamless Global Payments
how-it-works-des: A suite of tools that works smarter for you and for your bottom line. Bring every side of your business together — sales, payments, payroll, inventory, and more.

drive-sale.title: Drive Sale
drive-sale.des: Accepts payments wherever your customers are with POS software and hardware solutions

payment-link.title: Payment Link
payment-link.des: Use Payment Links to sell online without a website. Create a full payment page in just a few clicks and share the link with your customers - no code required

sale-online.title: Sale Online
sale-online.des: Let online shoppers buy in just a few taps when you connect your store to social media

advance-report.title: Advance Reporting
advance-report.des: Make more informed business decisions with a powerful dashboard that gives the full picture of your business

cash-flow.title: Cash Flow
cash-flow.des: Think ahead with banking features built-in. Start saving, managing money on-hand, and pay back loans all through your Dashboard

payment-service.title: Payout Service
payment-service.des: Payouts are how money from your customers get deposited into your bank account. Depending on your business location and payout schedule, funds from your transactions will be paid out to your bank account on a rolling basis

web-generic.title: Website Generics
web-generic.des: Build ecommerce website online with builder tools

partners-des: A suite of tools that works smarter for you and for your bottom line. Bring every side of your business together — sales, payments, payroll, inventory, and more.
